description_uz: Yoshlarni zamonaviy dasturlash va IT ko'nikmalariga o'rgatish orqali raqamli iqtisodiyot uchun mutaxassislar tayyorlash tashabbusi.
description_en: An initiative to train youth in modern programming and IT skills to supply specialists for the digital economy.

description_uz: Maktab o'quvchilari o'rtasida algoritmik fikrlash va dasturlashni targ'ib qiluvchi ta'limiy loyiha.
description_en: An educational project promoting algorithmic thinking and programming among school students.

description_uz: Hududlarda IT ekotizimini rivojlantirish va yoshlarni texnologiyaga qiziqtirish uchun yaratilgan innovatsion maydon.
description_en: An innovation hub created to develop regional IT ecosystems and inspire youth towards technology.

description_uz: Xalqaro IT sertifikatlarini olishni qo'llab-quvvatlash va malakani tasdiqlash dasturi.
description_en: A program supporting the acquisition of international IT certifications and validating professional skills.

description_uz: Iqtidorli yoshlarni aniqlash va chuqurlashtirilgan IT yo'nalishlari bo'yicha tayyorlash tizimi.
description_en: A system to identify gifted youth and provide intensive training in advanced IT domains.

description_uz: Respublika va xalqaro informatika olimpiadalariga tayyorlash hamda ishtirok etishni tashkil qilish.
description_en: Preparation and participation support for national and international informatics olympiads.

description_uz: O'z-o'zini boshqarish va peer-to-peer tamoyiliga asoslangan zamonaviy dasturlash maktabi.
description_en: A modern programming school based on self-directed, peer-to-peer learning principles.

description_uz: STEM fanlariga qiziqishni oshirish va ilmiy izlanishlarni rag'batlantirish tashabbusi.
description_en: An initiative to increase interest in STEM fields and encourage scientific inquiry.

description_uz: Onlayn ta'lim platformasi: raqamli ko'nikmalar va zamonaviy fanlar bo'yicha kurslar.
description_en: Online learning platform offering courses on digital skills and modern disciplines.

description_uz: Murabbiylar va trenerlarni yangi pedagogik va texnik yondashuvlarga tayyorlash dasturi.
description_en: A program training mentors and trainers in modern pedagogical and technical approaches.

description_uz: O'quvchi va talabalar uchun ta'lim yo'nalishlari bo'yicha raqamli navigatsiya va maslahat vositasi.
description_en: A digital guidance and advisory tool for students to explore education pathways.

description_uz: Iqtidorli yoshlarni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi va ularning ITdagi rivojlanishini tezlashtiruvchi stipendiya dasturi.
description_en: A scholarship program supporting talented youth and accelerating their development in IT.
